alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 4:24PM EST until January 22 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following counties, Gadsden and Leon. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 424 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen in the last 4 Hours. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tallahassee, Midway, Woodville, Havana, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Innovation Park, Mission San Luis, Lake Bradford, Bragg Stadium, Springsax Park, Leon County Civic Center, Kleman Plaza, Gaither Community Center, Levy Park, State Capital Complex, Tallahassee Regional A/P and Tallahassee Mall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
